p: Pre‐admission laboratory tests (Table 1) showed a mildly elevated white blood cell count (9200/μL), with neutrophils at 82.1%, lymphocytes at 10.7%, and eosinophils at 0.8%. The serum KL‐6 level was normal, but C‐reactive protein (CRP) was elevated (11.3 mg/dL). All microbiological and immunological test results were negative.
